Package Logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    The logic of the game board, handles movements
    Game
    Contains the current board and the leaderboard
    LeaderBoard
    The class that represents the leaderboard which can be saved, loaded, visualized extends AbstractTableModel to be able to pass as a model for a JTable
    LeaderBoardRow
    Stores data we want to represent from a saved game implements the Serializable interface to be able to serialize
    Position
    The class that represents a position in the row-column coordinate system
    Tile
    The class that represents a Tile
